title: Evinced’s accessibility testing solutions triple in adoption
description:
Evinced, a provider of web and mobile accessibility solutions, saw its customer base triple in 2023 on the back of new prevention-focused tools like Unit Tester and Design Assistant. These innovations allow developers and designers to automatically catch accessibility issues long before release, marking a shift for the industry toward prevention versus post-hoc fixes. The... Read more »

The post Evinced’s accessibility testing solutions triple in adoption  appeared first on Developer Tech News.
